title: Tibco EMS Overview
description:
## Tibco EMS Integration

This dashboard provides an overview of the health, performance, and usage metrics of the TIBCO Enterprise Message Service (EMS). It is designed to help administrators and operations teams monitor the EMS environment in real-time, ensuring the reliability, availability, and efficiency of messaging services. Key metrics such as server health, connection statuses, message rates, queue depths and memory usage are visualized to facilitate proactive management and troubleshooting.

For more information, please refer to:
**Useful Links**

* [Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/tibco_ems/?tab=host)
* [Tibco EMS Documentation](https://docs.tibco.com/products/tibco-enterprise-message-service)

definition.content: This dashboard provides an overview of the health, performance, and usage metrics of the TIBCO Enterprise Message Service (EMS). It is designed to help administrators and operations teams monitor the EMS environment in real-time, ensuring the reliability, availability, and efficiency of messaging services. Key metrics such as server health, connection statuses, message rates, queue depths and memory usage are visualized to facilitate proactive management and troubleshooting.
This provides statistics for message producers, focusing on metrics such as message count and size, as well as the rate of message production
This provides general server information, such as connection and message statistics as well as storage usage metrics.
This provides statistics for message consumers, focusing on metrics such as message count and size, as well as the rate of message consumption
This provides statistics for queue depth and persistent queue death as well as the size for each.
